msg: HDFS-5737. Replacing only the default ACL can fail to copy unspecified base entries from the access ACL. Contributed by Chris Nauroth.

msg: HIVE-5224 : When creating table with AVRO serde, the "avro.schema.url" should be about to load serde schema from file system beside HDFS (Shuaishuai Nie via Thejas Nair)
